item.title: Why itâ€™s okay to be â€œan ordinaryâ€ developer
item.author: michael@datachain.consulting (Michael John PeÃ±a)
item.description: Someone once asked me, what does it take to become a prominent developer? A 10X Engineer? You know some who are “extraordinary”. What do you mean by extraordinary? I’ve always had some thoughts (all of us do) around it, but my understanding and opinion of it is now much more concrete. Actually, this applies not only to being a developer, but to any other career or profession that you’re in.
